specifications.title: Architecture Overview
specifications.summary: "Read me first" document for the overall architecture. Provides a summary of the reference, archetype and service models, and describes global semantics.
specifications.micro_summary: Global description of openEHR design principles and architecture

specifications.title: Object Data Instance Notation (ODIN)
specifications.summary: This is the JSON-like notation used to express various sections of ADL archetypes including description, terminology and annotations, and also BMM files.

specifications.title: Basic Meta-Model (BMM)
specifications.summary: BMM provides a human- and machine-readable / writable format for defining object models. It can be considered a much more compact and readable alternative to XMI.

specifications.title: BMM Persistence Model and Syntax
specifications.summary: A human-readable and machine-processable save format for BMM.

specifications.title: Expression Language (EL)
specifications.summary: The openEHR Expression Language defines an extensible core model and syntax for specifying expressions for particular purposes elsewhere in openEHR.

specifications.title: ISO 18308 Conformance Statement
specifications.summary: Document describing conformance of openEHR architecture to ISO TS 18308, "Requirements for EHR Architectures".

expressions.title: Base UML
expressions.description: UML file for openEHR Base classes, as MagicDraw 19. Contains UML 2.5 standard XMI file.
